message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to own this unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the value of the product, $9,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $7,500, which is still a fair price considering your value of $8,000. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I believe the product's value is higher than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $8,500. This is a fair compromise considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
